entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 65 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill minus 54 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
